column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My water was un refilled for a good portion of the meal. I feel like he kept looking at us hoping that we would ask for a check
column2: he was obviously not checking if we needed anything else.. since again
column3: my water was not refilled. At the end he gave us the check without saying anything.. no thank you. My boyfriend and I are industry so these things bothered us.
